thread.title: Afternoon Tea
thread.title_full: Afternoon Tea - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Travel_Ang_1
title: Afternoon Tea
text: Found this online by looking for something different to including the family dog...afternoon tea sounded perfect as a Mother's Day treat. Arrived and was pleasantly surprised the staff are all a credit to the Egerton House, courteous, friendly and extremely professional. The only downside would be that you would pay a similar price for afternoon tea in somewhere like the Ritz, Fortnum & Mason etc and the quality would be amazing. The sandwiches were great, the scones a bit stale and far too many desserts.
